about_the_game:
Delve deeper into the chilling mysteries of Blue Roche with the DLC of "Myth Or Reality: Snowbound Secrets"! This enhanced version of the game invites you to explore four additional locations, each brimming with complex puzzles, hidden objects, and enthralling new mysteries. Engage with the game's rich atmosphere, unravel the deeper narratives of intriguing characters, and immerse yourself in the lore of a world where myths blur with reality!

Discover new areas including the caretaker’s tower and the editor-in-chief's office. Each location is packed with unique challenges and secrets that push your detective skills to the limits!

🧚‍♀️ ELECTRIFYING NOTES!
Learn the intricacies of electrical circuits in the caretaker's tower. Your knowledge could be the difference between illumination and a shocking twist!

🧚‍♀️ LANGUAGE OF THE GIANTS!
Take on the unique challenge of learning the Bigfoot language. Set up the old projector and begin your linguistic journey to bridge the communication gap between humans and the elusive bigfoots!

🧚‍♀️ UNRAVEL DEEP MYSTERIES!
Investigate the disappearance of the sheriff's sister by searching through the cluttered office of the town's editor-in-chief. What secrets will you uncover about Blue Roche's keeper of order?

🧚‍♀️ UNCOVER HISTORIC FEUDS!
Explore the Bigfoot Chronicle to delve into the longstanding feud between humans and bigfoots. Understanding their past may be key to securing peace!

The city of Blue Roche is counting on you to resolve its chilling conundrum. With snow-capped intrigue and icy adventures waiting, the "Myth Or Reality: Snowbound Secrets" DLC promises to be a thrilling expansion to your gaming experience!
